title: Elite announces key-note conference speaker
text:
Elite announces key-note conference speaker 6 August 2015 
The TV presenter and cyclist Mark Beaumont will be a speaker at this year’s Elite Travel Group conference in Cadiz. 
The adventurer will be a key-note speaker at the event which will take place from October 2-4. 
Beaumont has travelled to more than 100 countries and has cycled round the world as well as the length of Africa. 
Elite chief executive Neil Basnett said: “We were trying to find a motivational speaker with a travel-related background and could relate to the audience. 
“He’s had to face some real challenges and on occasions required extra motivation to keep on. 
“I’m sure there have been times when he’s wanted to give up but kept on doing it.”
